com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles

Class MleImageRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleRole
      • com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles.Mle2dRole
        • com.wizzer.mle.parts.roles.MleImageRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wizzer.mle.parts.j2d.roles.I2dRole, com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.IMleRole

    public class MleImageRole
extends Mle2dRole
    This class implements a Role that can display an image.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard
